description:
The whole gang decides to check out a haunted house, each with their own high expectations. Thrilling and chilling developments only accelerate the chaos...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shaky Loves and Horror! A Midsummer`s Nightmare!!
Yureru Koigokoro to Kaiki! Manatsu no Akumu!!
揺れる恋心と怪奇! 真夏の悪夢!!
